@@ -44,16 +44,27 @@ def will_write(self, filename):
                             "before running the generators")
         self.filenames.add(filename)

body: Is it OK in Makefiles to list something as an output but then not touch it? cmake Makefile target will still use this code in the caffe2 build, for instance. Won't the Makefile continually  try to re-run gen.py on every make because the outputs are older than gen?
